original_text: So husbands should love their wives, just as they love their own bodies. A man who loves his wife shows that he loves himself.
korean_text: 이와 같이 남편들도 자기 아내 사랑하기를 자기 자신과 같이 할지니 자기 아내를 사랑하는 자는 자기를 사랑하는 것이라

sentences.original_text: So husbands should love their wives
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 남편들은 자기 아내를 사랑해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: just as they love their own bodies
A man who loves his wife
